summary: Evidence-only narrative from second-brain artifacts: (1) Phase 8 was closed out on 2026-02-12 with a handoff toward Phase 9 planning. (2) A 2026-02-13 codex audit focused on quote/orderbook scope and tightened robustness/audit framing. (3) Claude closeouts on 2026-02-13 and 2026-02-15 document Phase 10 Tier-1 additive-ladder readiness and governance alignment, but both remain blocked by the same data-sufficiency gate. (4) The pressure-test report on 2026-02-15 confirms gate status as blocked_by_data_gate with 94 usable windows versus 200 required (deficit 106). This indicates the current stop condition is functioning as intended, not a regression in process control.
key_decisions: Narrative constrained to artifacts available in second-brain (no repo-internal or conversational claims outside indexed files).
Data-gate blocker is represented as current factual state, not inferred pipeline failure.
Timeline is presented with explicit dates and artifact pointers to preserve replayability.
A known artifact-id mismatch is preserved as an uncertainty rather than normalized away.
open_questions: 1. The 2026-02-15 Claude closeout references artifact/claude_2026_02_13_phase10-tasks-and-phase9-ladder-exhaust, but the available 2026-02-13 Claude file is 2026-02-13-phase10-ladder-prep-l1-tier1. Is this a naming drift or missing artifact?
2. When will the Phase 10 data gate reach >=200 usable windows so blocked steps can execute?
3. Should this narrative be mirrored into a dedicated Kalshi history scene node for one-hop retrieval?
next_steps: Run `just phase10-count-windows` in the Kalshi repo to re-check the gate.
If gate passes, execute the documented Phase 10 pipeline sequence from the Claude closeout artifact.
Repair artifact-id mismatch if a canonical 2026-02-13 Claude artifact slug is required.
thinking_trace_attachments: Gate state used verbatim from report fields: usable_aligned_windows=94, required=200, deficit=106.

prompt_lineage.summary: Craft a summary narrative of the Kalshi development history using only second-brain and no hallucination.

resumption_notes: For continuation, load the six Kalshi artifacts and one pressure-test report referenced in thinking_trace_attachments, then re-check whether a newer gate count artifact exists after 2026-02-15.
